title: 2015 Macbook Pro Display Issues- 820-4924
message: We have a water damaged 2015 Macbook Pro that originally came to us from another shop having display issues.  Sometimes backlight works sometimes it does not.  We have replaced the display and the entire logic board and the display issue continues??  Has anyone seen anything like this?

title: 2015 Macbook Pro Display Issues- 820-4924
message:
Do not understand.....

[QUOTE="Puevig reven, post: 6283"] We have replaced the display and the entire logic board and the display issue continues[/QUOTE]

It means have you tried other display in the original logic board and the original display in other logic board and the problem is still there in both cases?????

Please explain....

title: 2015 Macbook Pro Display Issues- 820-4924
message: SMC_LID goes to the trackpad too......

title: 2015 Macbook Pro Display Issues- 820-4924
message: Thank you Duke-I will check it first thing tomorrow morning!!

title: 2015 Macbook Pro Display Issues- 820-4924
message:
We have tried new logic board in damaged laptop- issue still occurs.
Then we tried another display with the new logic board on the damaged laptop- issue still occurs;(
